display a variable:

Do you have logical structures turned on? (If so, this is a dup of bug 32222). 
If you have logical structures turned on, then we are performing an evaluation 
to generate the contents of the variables view for certain types (maps, 
collections, map entries). The evaluations create objects on the target that 
can be garbage collected at any time. Generally when this happens, it is an 
intermitent problem (and can be avoided by turning off "logical structures").

Ok, I had show logical structures on. So you can close as dup of bug 32222.

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 32222 ***
